description: Representing yeah pronounced with the mouth snapped closed at the end (excrescent IPA(key): /p/).  Compare yep, nope, welp, and ope.

examples: But you positively must have much, much more than the laconic "yups" and "nups" of the John Waynes and Gary Coopers...

Maxine has joined her sister Brooke's state-of-the-art health club Megareps around the corner but isn't quite used yet to this nightly spectacle of yups on treadmills, plodding to nowhere while watching CNN or the sports channels  [â€¦]
